@DaenKith Hi. They can travel without any issues.

urls.description: Yuri G. shared a post on Instagram: "📸 New Shot!!! 📍 Location: Rome Fiumicino Airport FCO/LIRF 🌐 Airline: Wizz Air ✈ Aircraft: Airbus A321-271NX 📖 Registration: HA-LVB 📝 Remarks: Takeoff from RWY 25. @romeaviationspotters #romeaviationspotters #ras #airbus #a321 #airbusa321 #wizz #wizzair". Follow their account to see 3194 posts.

data.text: @fenners73 @WizzAirUK_W9 @UK_CAA Hi There! We're truly sorry for the inconvenience. Due to the busy summer season, there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience.

data.text:
@sabblueberry Hi there! A foldable baby stroller or a small foldable cot travel are free of charge (will be loaded in aircraft hold). In order to take car seat on board you have to purchase extra seat.
Have a good day:)

data.text: @SarahAnnePage1 @lastminute_com Hi, please accept our sincere apologies. In this case, you can accept the schedule change, rebook it for free or request 120% WIZZ credits or a 100% original payment refund. The easiest way to request it is under your WIZZ profile.

data.text: Going to this cave is an adventure in itself, since it can only be entered on tiny boats. How fun, right? And once you’re inside, the water under you is the most beautiful shade of blue you've ever seen. It truly is breathtaking! Check it out, and head to https://t.co/AeMNWOslh5! https://t.co/UVtIkBO0ue

data.text: @agushko Hi. Please try using a different device. We'd suggest to use a computer or laptop with the newest version of Google Chrome browser as the site is optimalized to that. You can also try clearing your browser history and cookies as those might also affect the website.

data.text:
@Bluelightde Hi. You can convert the credits to cash as long as you haven't spent any of them and your original payment method was card or bank transfer.
Please find the link to the WIZZ credit conversion request here: https://t.co/mCcVBnIWJu

@FlashbaqGaming Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.
